fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action

Coordination of the Notified Bodies for the Construction Products Regulation (Regulation No. (EU) 305/2011) 
Construction Products Regulation (Regulation No. (EU) 305/2011)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
The Danish Technological Institute (DTI) is an independent, non-profit institution approved by the Danish Mnistry for Education and Science. 
It develops, applies and disseminates research-based and technology-based knowledge to the Danish and international business sector. 
The Danish Technological Institute translates knowledge into real value for society.
